TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContextMenu extends System.Windows.Forms.Menu

span.span: Represents a shortcut menu.

summary.span: 雖然 會取代並且將功能加入至之前版本的 控制項；不過，也可以選擇保留 ，以提供回溯相容性 (Backward Compatibility) 以及供未來使用。

span.span: Although replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別表示可以在使用者控制項或表單區域上方按一下滑鼠右鍵時顯示的捷徑功能表。The class represents shortcut menus that can be displayed when the user clicks the right mouse button over a control or area of the form. 快顯功能表通常用來從不同的功能表項目結合提供內容給此應用程式的使用者很有用的表單。Shortcut menus are typically used to combine different menu items from a of a form that are useful for the user given the context of the application. 例如，您可以使用捷徑功能表，指派給控制項以提供功能表項目變更字型的文字，尋找文字內的控制項或複製並貼上文字的剪貼簿功能。For example, you can use a shortcut menu assigned to a control to provide menu items for changing the font of the text, finding text within the control, or Clipboard features for copying and pasting text. 您也可以新增顯示快顯功能表中的物件不位於提供情況不適合的特定命令來顯示。You can also display new objects in a shortcut menu that are not located within a to provide situation specific commands that are not appropriate for the to display. 一般而言，當使用者在控制項或表單本身上方按一下滑鼠右鍵，會顯示快顯功能表。Typically, a shortcut menu is displayed when a user clicks the right mouse button over a control or the form itself. 可見的控制項和有繫結屬性類別，以顯示快顯功能表的控制項。Visible controls and have a property that binds the class to the control that displays the shortcut menu. 可以使用多個控制項。More than one control can use a . 您可以使用屬性來判斷哪一個控制項上一次顯示的捷徑功能表，才能執行控制項特定的工作，或修改的控制項顯示捷徑功能表。You can use the property to determine which control last displayed the shortcut menu in order to perform tasks specific to the control or to modify the shortcut menu displayed for the control. 您可能想要知道為了設定核取記號，停用項目，並向使用者顯示功能表之前執行其他功能表工作顯示快顯功能表時。You might want to know when the shortcut menu is being displayed in order to set check marks, disable items, and perform other menu tasks before the menu is displayed to the user. 您可以處理事件，以判斷顯示快顯功能表時。You can handle the event to determine when the shortcut menu is being displayed. > [!NOTE] > 若要重複使用中所顯示的物件用於，您必須建立一份功能表使用方法類別。In order to reuse objects that are displayed in a for use in a , you must create a copy of the menu using the method of the class. 您也可以合併的功能表項目，以及子功能表項目，為單一物件使用方法類別。You can also merge menu items and their submenu items into a single object using the method of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立事件處理常式事件的。The following code example creates an event handler for the event of the . 事件處理常式程式碼會判斷這兩個控制項名為`pictureBox1`並名為`textBox1`是顯示快顯功能表的控制項。The code in the event handler determines which of two controls a named `pictureBox1` and a named `textBox1` is the control displaying the shortcut menu. 根據哪個控制項造成若要顯示其捷徑功能表，新增適當的控制項物件到。Depending on which control caused the to display its shortcut menu, the control adds the appropriate objects to the . 此範例中，您需要的執行個體類別，名為`contextMenu1`表單內定義。This example requires that you have an instance of the class, named `contextMenu1`, defined within the form. 此範例也會要求必須有並新增至表單，並這些控制項的屬性設定為`contextMenu1`。This example also requires that you have a and added to a form and that the property of these controls is set to `contextMenu1`. [!code-cpp[Classic ContextMenu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ContextMenu Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ContextMenu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ContextMenu Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ContextMenu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ContextMenu Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個版本的建構函式來建立包含在建立時指定其功能表項目。You can use this version of the constructor to create a that has its menu items specified at the time it is created. 一旦您已使用這個版本的建構函式，您可以新增更多的功能表項目利用方法類別。Once you have used this version of the constructor, you can add additional menu items to the by using the method of the class. 您可以存取透過屬性。You can access the through the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構捷徑功能表，並使用方法。The following code example demonstrates constructing a shortcut menu and using the method. 要執行此範例中，貼上包含名為 Button1 的按鈕的表單中的下列程式碼。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a button named Button1. 請確定其事件處理方法相關聯的所有事件。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ManualContextMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ManualContextMenu/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ManualContextMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ManualContextMenu/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ManualContextMenu#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ManualContextMenu/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ContextMenu1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ContextMenu1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#170](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#170)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#170](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#170)]

summary.span: 發生於顯示捷徑功能表之前。

span.span: Occurs before the shortcut menu is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個事件來初始化物件顯示之前。You can use this event to initialize the objects before they are displayed. 例如，如果您使用三個控制項，而且您想要停用特定的功能表項目，在依據會顯示捷徑功能表，您可以建立此事件的事件處理常式。For example, if you use a for three controls and you want to disable certain menu items in the depending on which is displaying the shortcut menu, you can create an event handler for this event. 您可以使用屬性來判斷哪些將顯示，並停用適當物件。You could use the property to determine which is about to display the and disable the appropriate objects. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立事件處理常式事件的。The following code example creates an event handler for the event of the . 事件處理常式程式碼會判斷這兩個控制項名為`pictureBox1`並名為`textBox1`是顯示快顯功能表的控制項。The code in the event handler determines which of two controls a named `pictureBox1` and a named `textBox1` is the control displaying the shortcut menu. 根據哪個控制項造成若要顯示其捷徑功能表，新增適當的控制項物件到。Depending on which control caused the to display its shortcut menu, the control adds the appropriate objects to the . 此範例中，您需要的執行個體類別，名為`contextMenu1`表單內定義。This example requires that you have an instance of the class, named `contextMenu1`, defined within the form. 此範例也會要求必須有並新增至表單，並這些控制項的屬性設定為`contextMenu1`。This example also requires that you have a and added to a form and that the property of these controls is set to `contextMenu1`. [!code-cpp[Classic ContextMenu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ContextMenu Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ContextMenu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ContextMenu Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ContextMenu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ContextMenu Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual bool ProcessCmdKey (ref System.Windows.Forms.Message msg, System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData, System.Windows.Forms.Control control);

.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ProcessCmdKey(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& msg, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData, class System.Windows.Forms.Control control) cil managed

param.name: msg
param.span: 由參考所傳遞的 ，代表要處理的視窗訊息。

span.span: A , passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.

param.span: 其中一個 值，表示要處理的按鍵。

span.span: One of the values that represents the key to process.

param.name: control
param.span: 要套用此命令鍵的控制項。

span.span: The control to which the command key applies.
Processes a command key.

returns.span: 如果字元已由控制項處理，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在處理命令按鍵前置處理的訊息，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys. 命令按鍵是一律優先於一般輸入按鍵的按鍵。Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys. 命令索引鍵的範例包括加速器和功能表的捷徑。Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts. 此方法必須傳回`true`指出它已處理命令按鍵，或`false`表示索引鍵不 command 機碼。The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key. 當控制項裝載在 Windows Forms 應用程式，或為 ActiveX 控制項時，只會呼叫這個方法。This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control. 方法會先判斷控制項是否有，和如果是的話，可讓處理命令按鍵。The method first determines whether the control has a , and if so, enables the to process the command key. 如果 command 機碼不是功能表快顯控制項具有父代，要將金鑰傳遞至父系的方法。If the command key is not a menu shortcut and the control has a parent, the key is passed to the parent's method. 結果會是該金鑰 「 反昇 」 的控制階層架構的命令。The net effect is that command keys are "bubbled" up the control hierarchy. 除了使用者按下索引鍵，索引鍵的資料也會指出這，如果有的話，在按下輔助按鍵與索引鍵相同的時間。In addition to the key the user pressed, the key data also indicates which, if any, modifier keys were pressed at the same time as the key. 輔助按鍵可包含 SHIFT、 CTRL 和 ALT 鍵。Modifier keys include the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.

permission.span: 立即呼叫端呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼。

span.span: for the immediate caller to call unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration:

para.span: 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中的，控制項應該傳回指出它已處理的索引鍵。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, a control should return to indicate that it has processed the key.

para.span: 針對控制項，也就是呼叫基底類別的結果不會處理的索引鍵方法應該傳回。

span.span: For keys that are not processed by the control, the result of calling the base class's method should be returned.

para.span: 控制項將很少，鮮，需要覆寫這個方法。

span.span: Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出控制項所顯示的文字是否從右到左。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether text displayed by the control is displayed from right to left.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您的選單，以支援由右至左書寫的語言。This property enables your menus to support languages that are written from right to left. 當這個屬性設定為`RightToLeft.Yes`，功能表項目文字會顯示由右至左，而不是預設值由左到右的方法。When this property is set to `RightToLeft.Yes`, the menu item text is displayed from right to left instead of the default left to right method. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關如何啟用由右至左對齊方式會影響 Windows Form 控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For more information about how enabling right-to-left alignment affects Windows Forms controls, see the property.

exception.span: 指派給屬性的值不是 列舉型別的有效成員。

span.span: The value assigned to the property is not a valid member of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常當使用者按一下滑鼠右按鈕控制項或表單區域上的會顯示，繫結至。Typically, a is displayed when the user clicks the right mouse button on a control or area of the form that the is bound to. 若要手動顯示的特定位置的捷徑功能表，並將它繫結與特定的控制項，您可以使用這個方法。You can use this method to manually display the shortcut menu at a specific location and bind it with a specific control. 這個方法不會傳回之前關閉功能表。This method does not return until the menu is dismissed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構捷徑功能表，並使用方法。The following code example demonstrates constructing a shortcut menu and using the method. 要執行此範例中，貼上包含名為 Button1 的按鈕的表單中的下列程式碼。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a button named Button1. 請確定其事件處理方法相關聯的所有事件。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. value.span: 如果沒有任何控制項顯示捷徑功能表，屬性將傳回 。

span.span: If no control has displayed the shortcut menu, the property returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您判斷哪一個控制項目前顯示中所定義的捷徑功能表。This property enables you to determine which control currently displays the shortcut menu defined in the . 如果目前沒有顯示的捷徑功能表，您可以使用這個屬性來判斷哪一個控制項最後會顯示快顯功能表。If the shortcut menu is not currently displayed, you can use this property to determine which control last displayed the shortcut menu. 您可以使用這個屬性在事件以確保控制項顯示適當的功能表項目。You can use this property in the event to ensure that the control displays the proper menu items. 您也可以使用這個屬性，以將控制項的參考傳遞至方法，用於執行與快顯功能表中顯示的功能表命令相關聯的工作。You can also use this property to pass a reference to the control to a method that performs the tasks associated with a menu command displayed in the shortcut menu. 由於類別繼承自，您也可以使用這個屬性，如果與表單相關聯。Since the class inherits from , you can also use this property if the is associated with a form. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立事件處理常式事件的。The following code example creates an event handler for the event of the . 事件處理常式程式碼會判斷這兩個控制項名為`pictureBox1`並名為`textBox1`是顯示快顯功能表的控制項。The code in the event handler determines which of two controls a named `pictureBox1` and a named `textBox1` is the control displaying the shortcut menu. 根據哪個控制項造成若要顯示其捷徑功能表，新增適當的控制項物件到。Depending on which control caused the to display its shortcut menu, the control adds the appropriate objects to the . 此範例中，您需要的執行個體類別，名為`contextMenu1`表單內定義。This example requires that you have an instance of the class, named `contextMenu1`, defined within the form. 此範例也會要求必須有並新增至表單，並這些控制項的屬性設定為`contextMenu1`。This example also requires that you have a and added to a form and that the property of these controls is set to `contextMenu1`. [!code-cpp[Classic ContextMenu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ContextMenu Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ContextMenu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ContextMenu Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ContextMenu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ContextMenu Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
